previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. Real Salt Lake | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 4, Real Salt Lake 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A compelling intraconference match is ahead when the New England Revolution play host to Real Salt Lake on Saturday evening at Gillette Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs Real Salt Lake | April 25, 2015

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt blocked. Álvaro Saborio (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Showtime in New England: http://t.co/IgTZdDZmR2 #NEvRSL http://t.co/Rehkmjf4qs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by John Stertzer (Real Salt Lake).
Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Krista Vicich
timelineItems.text: LOVE seeing the Fort full!! Loud and proud! @MidnightRiders @NErebellion #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt missed. Demar Phillips (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Elías Vásquez following a corner.
Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Andy Dorman.

timelineItems.name: Marco Delgado
timelineItems.text: Nasty challenge from Stertzer on Agudelo #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: That should be a red on Stertzer. No question. #mls #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Mike the Lion
timelineItems.text: The way he reacted, I thought that tackle ended Agudelo's renaissance #NEvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Demar Phillips.

timelineItems.name: Jay Wilson
timelineItems.text: Bummed @Jermainejunior is in defense tonight so no midfield/dreadlock battle with @KyleBeckerman Oh well. Go #NERevs http://t.co/7Eh0OAI6U1

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: "Shoes off" if you love the #NERevs! http://t.co/CCNMUgC4KH

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 15' #NERevs 0 #RSL 0 Plenty of possession in the attacking third for the Revs in the early stages, but no real chances to speak of just yet.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Teal Bunbury.
Offside, New England Revolution. Teal Bunbury tries a through ball, but Charlie Davies is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Elías Vásquez.

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Horton
timelineItems.text: 16' #RSL miscommunications leading to some nervous moments.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 16' #NERevs 0 #RSL 0 Almost disaster for RSL as miscommunication on a goal kick presents @JuanAgudelo with a chance, but they recover.

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: Haven't seen the #NERevs open a game with so much attacking intensity yet this season. #NEvRSL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Aaron Maund (Real Salt Lake) header from the center of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Aaron Maund sends a header just high

timelineItems.name: Brian Raftery
timelineItems.text: The fort sounds phenomenal tonight. VERY audible on the telecast. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth gets a fingertip to a Gil shot

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Aaron Maund (Real Salt Lake) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Luke Mulholland with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: BOBBY #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Olmes García with a cross.
Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.
Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Charlie
timelineItems.text: I love that the #NERevs cameraman zoomed out for the #HORSE kid

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New England Revolution 4, Real Salt Lake 0.

timelineItems.name: Revs Citizen
timelineItems.text: Pay back for all those nightmares at Rio Tinto. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake WUFC
timelineItems.text: Well played #NERevs. Come home men… We’ve got work to do and a lot more of the season to play. #RSLTID

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: FT. #NERevs 4:0 #RSL. Offense comes alive in a big way for locals, who get goals from 4 different sources. 1st Revs win over RSL since '09.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: All smiles in Foxborough as @NERevoution top @RealSaltLake 4-0 --> http://t.co/XRXEIkVeII #NEvRSL http://t.co/8OotvjXzCK

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: Way to win the games you should win, #NERevs. And to do it without any question.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: FT NE 4-0 RSL. An ugly two-game losing streak for RSL, which faces a short week ahead of Friday night's home match. #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: The #NERevs are now unbeaten in their last 14 games (inc. playoffs) at #FortressFoxboro. #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: All smiles in Foxborough as @NERevolution top @RealSaltLake 4-0 --> http://t.co/qcwi0X54BK #NEvRSL http://t.co/u0sb2AkBGK

timelineItems.text: Is there a reason the #RSL players are scared to have the ball? No one wants to bring it down, no possession.. Just send it deep...

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: Love Jones but his performance so far has been one of the worst in the #NERevs XI. Which is a crazy thing. Even at CB.

timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones making his 2nd straight start at CB for the #NERevs. Not a long-term move but reps should help if his USMNT move there sticks

timelineItems.text: Good by Farrell to keep that mistake from getting MUCH worse. #NERevs

timelineItems.text: 49' Tierney nearly grabs his second goal with his right foot, having a go from outside the area but Attinella saves it. #NERevs #RSL #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Jordan Goodman
timelineItems.text: I can't wait until #RSL stops making excuses and just goes out and wins. Losses are bad, they can't just blame refs, bad luck or injuries.

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: #NERevs play prettier when they're feeling confident. Little flashes of lovely footwork

timelineItems.name: Brian Little MLS

timelineItems.name: David van Hees
timelineItems.text: #RSL kinda think this formation is good, but we don't have the "make space" type of striker. Ok in set pieces, but not sharp in open play

timelineItems.name: Will England
timelineItems.text: The Revs are EN FUEGO!!! #NEvRSL

timelineItems.text: Attinella is standing on his head tonight. He may be the 1 bright spot for @RealSaltLake tonight #RSLtv #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: I thought the back of the net moved there. Holy smokes. RSL GK keeping this game … something something #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Will Northrup
timelineItems.text: Woodberry has earned the job. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: darrell rawlins
timelineItems.text: No possession = no opportunity #RSL #RSLtv

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: I do not like Kyle Beckerman. Do not. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Andrew Lord
timelineItems.text: #RSL still has a ton of talent at almost every position, but it's up to the coaches to put the players in a position to utilize those skills

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).
Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Real Salt Lake. Elías Vásquez tries a through ball, but Olmes García is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chris Farnes
timelineItems.text: I hope RSL concede more goals so that people will realize how terrible this year's squad really is. #NEvRSL #Cassarout

timelineItems.name: Jordan Goodman
timelineItems.text: Charlie Divies got into the 18 yard box and didn't dive? Color me surprised! #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Juan Agudelo.
Offside, Real Salt Lake. Luke Mulholland tries a through ball, but Olmes García is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: Pecka becomes 123rd player in #RSL history to appear in an @MLS match

timelineItems.comment: Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Between the 60 and 65th minutes, the #NERevs controlled an impressive 75.8% of the possession. They've controlled it all half. #NEvRSL #RSL

timelineItems.name: Marco Delgado
timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen having his best game of the season tonight IMO #NEvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Aaron Maund (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @CharlieDavies9 heads home his second of the season & @NERevolution's third of the night --> http://t.co/qsUATpVNZm #NEvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).
Olmes García (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Brian Little MLS
timelineItems.text: Do these refs remember how to call fouls and give cards out? #NERevs #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: Beckerman's fourth whistled foul on Nguyen? Fifth? No card. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Andrew Lord
timelineItems.text: One notable bright spot that I'm very excited about: Phillips' crosses have been basically perfect tonight. Bodes well for the future. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution).
Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution).
Attempt missed. Demar Phillips (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Hunter Squid A. ^S^
timelineItems.text: Ref still clueless about what advantage is. #RSL #NEvRSL #instantreplay

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #RSL maintained 67.2% of the possession through the first five minutes. #NERevs playing counterattack early. #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Davies, Bunbury, Agudelo, Nguyen. What a talented attack the New England Revolution have. #NotEvenMentioningRoweandFagundez #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Marco Delgado
timelineItems.text: Bunbury should have heeled that through to Nguyen on that earlier chance #NEvRSL

timelineItems.desc: Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card for a foul on Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Luke Mulholland catches Rowe

timelineItems.comment: Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: darrell rawlins
timelineItems.text: So many sloppy giveaways #RSL

timelineItems.name: Richard Murphy
timelineItems.text: Everybody Revs! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian Little MLS
timelineItems.text: Hello Mansally long time no see. #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Brian Little MLS
timelineItems.text: Hey look finally a yellow card to RSL. Stunned. #NERevs #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: Hey, Kenny Mansally's in the game. Watch... he'll do something positive. And then Steve Nicol will bench him for three months. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Thomas Nehren
timelineItems.text: With all the injuries, suspensions, & international duty, it's amazing #RSL even had 16 players to send to a game tonight #positivetweet

timelineItems.desc: Goal! Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) places a left footed shot from outside the box into the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kelyn Rowe.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Scott Caldwell makes it 4-0

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Steve Neumann (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Agudelo.

timelineItems.name: Brian Little MLS
timelineItems.text: SCOTTY CALDWELL!!!!! OMG!!! YES!!!! #NEREVS #NEvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) left footed shot from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!! SCOTTY!! It's Scott Caldwell's first career goal!! #NERevs http://t.co/MXsE0tVjUz
Lol this is the best chant ever #nerevs #ruaware #noshoes

timelineItems.name: Michael Mangum
timelineItems.text: I just feel bad for Attinella because hes had some incredible moments. 4-0 sure isnt his fault. #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Announced attendance for tonight's New England game against RSL at @GilletteStadium: 17,982. #NERevs #RSL #NEvRSL

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Oh my god, poor Jeff Attinella. That poor, poor goalkeeper. #NEvRSL #NERevs #RSL

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: This is what the #NERevs can do. Might be my favorite squad in the league right now. 4-0 over #RSL.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).
Olmes García (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Ben Walker
timelineItems.text: This game is about like watching "Raiders of the Lost Ark" when the Nazis open the Ark. Keep your eyes shut. #NEvRSL #RSL

timelineItems.desc: John Stertzer (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: John Stertzer catches Agudelo with a late tackle

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the top right corner.
Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kenny Mansally (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: ben ghazi
timelineItems.text: Love seeing the #NERevs appearing for the second ball after a cut out pass or blocked shot. So often nobody there. Keeping momentum is great

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Steve Neumann (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Second Half ends, New England Revolution 4, Real Salt Lake 0.
